title: Did the Mayor of the Simpsons say he cancelled the trip to the Bahamas while in the Bahamas?
subtitle: A section of the Simpsons was shared on social media after reports that C. Ted Cruz travelled to Cancún after a winter storm that caused massive power outages in Texas.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: In an episode of "The Simpsons," Mayor Quimby says that he will cancel a trip to the Bahamas while he is in the Bahamas, due to an ongoing epidemic.
